bill.title: Parking Spaces; Persons With Disabilities; Violations
bill.description: Clarifies that a violation is committed by a driver or registered owner of a vehicle; exempts lessors of rental or U-drive vehicles who provide contact information for the lessee or pay a lesser administrative fee; allows citations to be handed to the violator or affixed to the vehicle if the vehicle is unattended; clarifies that a citation may be mailed when the violator refuses the citation. (SD1)

history.action: (S) The committee(s) on TIA has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-10 2:00pm in conference room 224.
(S) The committee(s) on TIA deleted the measure from the public hearing scheduled on 2/10/2010 2:00:00 PM in conference room 224.
(S) The committee(s) on TIA has scheduled a public hearing on 02-08-10 2:00pm in conference room 224.

(S) The committee(s) on TIA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in TIA were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) English, Gabbard, Espero, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from TIA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2166) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JGO.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JGO.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO will hold a public decision making on 02-23-10 10:00AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JGO deferred the measure until 02-24-10 11:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JGO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JGO were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Taniguchi, Bunda, Gabbard, Nishihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Takamine.
(S) Reported from JGO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2604) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Bunda). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 92) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Referred to HLT/TRN, JUD, referral sheet 36
